query: UOW-05 revision attempt #2 for change_id 001 - TypeScript compile errors in renderer adapter service

Knowledge base has relevant patterns from UOW-04 revision #2 (learn-016) showing strict type narrowing patterns. Minimal scoped fix: install @types/three and add explicit node type annotation.
